body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger         Junior Ranger badge. NPS  Kids ages 5 and up can earn the official Sequoia and Kings Canyon National Parks Junior Ranger badge by completing the park's award-winning Junior Ranger booklet. Kids can ask for a free Junior Ranger booklet in any visitor center. You're at home and not in a park? No problem! You can be a Web Ranger. View more information about the National Park Service's WebRanger Program. more...
title: Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks: Be A Junior Ranger
